snippet.title: The First Descendant│Season 1 Invasion│Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The First Descendant’s Season 1 Invasion Update is fast approaching. 
Check out the teaser to uncover the lurking threats, and get ready to step into battle as Hailey, the sniper Descendant, on August 29th!
PLAY FREE NOW: https://tfd.nexon.com/

The First Descendant is a next generation third-person co-op action RPG shooter (looter shooter) featuring high-quality graphics developed using Unreal Engine 5. It presents fun strategic boss fights through 4-player co-op, various unique characters, exciting gunplay, and looting.

⭐️Follow us and receive our latest news!⭐️
Official Website: https://tfd.nexon.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FirstDescendant
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FirstDescendant
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/thefirstdescendant
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRjkGad-W6aGpLcZ0AKealg
